messages.message: semi-related wrt move — i’ve found myself accidentally moving a folder with thousands of files cause i had it clicked and accidentally moused over another folder. since there’s no way to confirm that i indeed want to move that huge folder, or cancel the move, i had to wait  for minutes for the move to finish and then undo it. would it be good to add a confirm dialog if the folder contains more than x files “You’re trying to move a folder with x files. Are you sure?”
ok awesome! yeah we spoke about it last night, looks like she put it in to asana. thanks!
